Game information:
:
In the story of Divinity: Original Sin us falls
the role of some "Hunters source" - a little-known
warriors guild, which had already been dubbed "magic police."

In this largely storyline Divinity: Original Sin event precedes
the very first part of the Divinity, which marked the beginning
of the world-famous fantasy series. We are waiting for the familiar
characters, but radically different approach to the story campaign.

From the outset, the passage of Divinity: Original Sin tell
us that the world faces an invasion of orcs rivellona Tanarota
who managed to master the powerful magic that distort reality.
Now free peoples in Divinity simply impossible to resist the
fury of the orcs, and only two people are able to prevent future wars.

So, the main characters Divinity: Original Sin became at
once two characters: damn warrior, who was released from
custody, and a mysterious girl, who managed to conquer death.
However, throughout the game in Divinity saved pleasant affair:
Heroes combines some terrible secret which will only be able to find you.

Another key feature of Divinity: Original Sin was that the game
implements a classless system, which will be the basis of a number
of diverse abilities to develop skills of the protagonists. However,
in order to resist the stronger enemies in Divinity: Original Sin
implemented to collect detachments of troops, which can be assigned to
commanders, as well as steps to improve the combat system of the army.

The game world in the new part of Divinity surprise you its realism
and openness: you will travel through the vast Rivellon, facing face
to face with a variety of unknown creatures, showing extreme caution.
Each offense in the world Divinity can cost you your life!

Game Features:

The two main characters
The lack of classes in the system of character development
Set of capabilities and a wide arsenal of weapons
Ability to recruit mercenaries in the squad and develop
general skills and spells to deal effectively with the enemy
Advanced system of dialogues, which gives
an opportunity to express their point of view
Interaction with any objects and combining them to create new objects
Turn-based battle system with the ability to implement
an elaborate tactics, using and combining skills, spells,
terrain and terrain features, work together
Multiplayer mode.
Level editor. Two in one: the game and the opportunity to
create your own campaign!
Music for the game was written by Kirill Pokrovsky,
the ex-keyboardist of "Aria" and "Masters"

Repack Features:

Divinity: Original Sin
Version of the game - v1.0.107.0
Do not cut / recoded

Choice of Cracks during installation between 3DMGAME & RELOADED
